onboarding_screen.first_body: You can easily manage all of your daily tasks in DoMe for free
onboarding_screen.second_body: In Uptodo  you can create your personalized routine to stay productive
onboarding_screen.third_body: You can organize your daily tasks by adding your tasks into separate categories

auth_start_screen.title: Welcome to UpTodo
auth_start_screen.body: Please login to your account or create new account to continue
